duties_responsibilities.duty: Sourcing items from Zero Panik for upcycling
Transforming items into one-of-a-kind, upcycled fashion pieces
Utilizing sewing skills and creativity in the upcycling process
Documenting work through photographs and videos
Returning fabric scraps and leftover items for recycling
Having finished pieces displayed on Zero Panik's website with designer accreditation

education_certification.credential: Must be a fashion student currently studying in San Francisco
